event.description: Jimmy Rollins flies out to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Shane Victorino pops out to shortstop Tyler Greene in foul territory.
Chase Utley walks.
Ryan Howard walks. Chase Utley to 2nd.
Jayson Werth grounds out, pitcher Kyle Lohse to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Raul Ibanez grounds out, first baseman Albert Pujols to pitcher Kyle Lohse.
Pedro Feliz strikes out swinging.
Carlos Ruiz singles on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Joe Blanton called out on strikes.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out, second baseman Skip Schumaker to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Shane Victorino called out on strikes.
Chase Utley grounds out to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Ryan Howard singles on a line drive to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Jayson Werth homers (3) on a fly ball to right center field. Ryan Howard scores.
Raul Ibanez lines out to third baseman Joe Thurston.
Pedro Feliz grounds out, third baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Carlos Ruiz grounds out, shortstop Tyler Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Joe Blanton called out on strikes.
Jimmy Rollins singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Shane Victorino singles on a line drive to right fielder Ryan Ludwick. Jimmy Rollins to 2nd.
Chase Utley hit by pitch. Jimmy Rollins to 3rd. Shane Victorino to 2nd.
Ryan Howard hits a grand slam (5) to right field. Jimmy Rollins scores. Shane Victorino scores. Chase Utley scores.
Jayson Werth doubles (7) on a line drive to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Pitching Change: Trever Miller replaces Kyle Lohse, batting 9th.
Raul Ibanez strikes out swinging.
Pedro Feliz lines out to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Pitching Change: Blaine Boyer replaces Trever Miller, batting 9th, replacing Khalil Greene.
Carlos Ruiz grounds out, shortstop Tyler Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Joe Blanton strikes out swinging.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out, second baseman Skip Schumaker to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Pitching Change: Dennys Reyes replaces Blaine Boyer, batting 9th, replacing Brian Barden.
Shane Victorino strikes out swinging.
Chase Utley singles on a line drive to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Ryan Howard called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Kyle McClellan replaces Dennys Reyes, batting 9th.
Jayson Werth strikes out on a foul tip.
Pitching Change: Ryan Franklin replaces Kyle McClellan, batting 9th.
Raul Ibanez strikes out on a foul tip.
Pedro Feliz flies out to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Defensive Substitution: Colby Rasmus replaces center fielder Rick Ankiel, batting 6th, playing center field.
Carlos Ruiz flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Pitching Change: Brad Thompson replaces Ryan Franklin, batting 7th, replacing catcher Yadier Molina.
Defensive Substitution: Jason LaRue replaces pitcher Ryan Franklin, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Dobbs replaces Ryan Madson.
Greg Dobbs lines out to pitcher Brad Thompson.
Jimmy Rollins flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Shane Victorino strikes out swinging.
Skip Schumaker called out on strikes.
Joe Thurston grounds out softly, catcher Carlos Ruiz to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Albert Pujols flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Chris Duncan pops out to third baseman Pedro Feliz.
Ryan Ludwick singles on a ground ball to left fielder Raul Ibanez, deflected by shortstop Jimmy Rollins.
Rick Ankiel flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Yadier Molina pops out to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Tyler Greene grounds out, third baseman Pedro Feliz to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Kyle Lohse hit by pitch.
Skip Schumaker grounds out, pitcher Joe Blanton to first baseman Ryan Howard. Kyle Lohse to 2nd.
Joe Thurston hits a ground-rule double (6) on a fly ball to left field. Kyle Lohse scores.
Albert Pujols walks.
Chris Duncan reaches on a fielding error by second baseman Chase Utley. Joe Thurston out at home, second baseman Chase Utley to catcher Carlos Ruiz.
Ryan Ludwick grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Rick Ankiel strikes out swinging.
Yadier Molina flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Tyler Greene flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Khalil Greene replaces Trever Miller.
Khalil Greene flies out to left fielder Raul Ibanez.
Skip Schumaker singles on a line drive to left fielder Raul Ibanez.
Joe Thurston singles on a ground ball to left fielder Raul Ibanez. Skip Schumaker to 2nd.
Albert Pujols lines out to left fielder Raul Ibanez.
Chris Duncan grounds out, second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Ryan Ludwick walks.
Rick Ankiel hit by pitch. Ryan Ludwick to 2nd.
Yadier Molina reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Pedro Feliz. Ryan Ludwick to 3rd. Rick Ankiel to 2nd.
Tyler Greene strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brian Barden replaces Blaine Boyer.
Brian Barden grounds into a force out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to second baseman Chase Utley. Yadier Molina out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Scott Eyre replaces Joe Blanton, batting 9th.
Skip Schumaker grounds out, second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Joe Thurston doubles (7) on a line drive to right fielder Jayson Werth.
